column2: This is where the crops for your country are made.
A deep network of tunnels and digging sites with the sole purpos of bringing riches from under the ground.
Lumber gets processed to be used in diverse industries.
A place where heroes and common men alike gather and enjoy a good drink
A small village with a few people walking the streets and going on their daily busines.
People can be seen walking on the streets of this village rather frequently and shops are being used from time to time.
Merchants coming from far and away are now using the roads of this town to bring their wares and the streets are busy
Shops can be found in most places now and the streets are alive both at day and at night.
The roads of this metropolis are swarming with people, shops can be seen in every corner and there is oppertunity wherever you go.
A public garden that calms everyone visiting it.
The center of commerce in the area
Soldiers and Workers alike get equipped by the goods produced in this building
The heart of every settlement in Azeroth

A massive flying citadel based on Nerubian architecture and empowered with dark magic. These flying fortresses house elite Scourge troops and serve as invasion points for the Scourge throughout Azeroth. Deep inside the corridors elite death knights train, twisted experiments are conducted, and horrors are constructed. The most famous necropolis, Naxxramas, makes even the most brave mortal feel a sense of dread.
Ziggurat's serve as centers for the Death God worshippers. These centers attract cultist worshippers who are known for their sorcery and plaguespreading.
Plaguespreaders are floating relics which unleash a plagued mist to desecrate the very earth beaneath them.

Horrorpits house the living slaves of the Scourge. Those who are fortunate enough to be captured by the Scourge are force to live the rest of their short lives in ore mining pits. Sooner or later however, they will become undead.
The Fleshworks house mad scientists who create the foulest creatures known to man. Abominations, flesh giants, bone constructs, these are only a few of the commonly known creations.
Unspeakable experiments upon living creatures are conducted here. It is here where the Scourge continue to perfect their unholy plague.

It is here where Scourge troops are equipped for war. From the lowest skeleton warrior to the most skilled death knight, Scourge smiths work endlessly to create  armor and weapons for the undead legions.
Necromancers, death knights and abominations are just a few of the unspeakable horrors that walk in this mighty Citadel made of saronit that is built around the frozen throne.
Deep in the frozen wastes of northrend lies the frozen throne, a huge frozen spire protected by magical runes.
Created from water of the Well of Eternity this place of pure arcane energies quickly became the main source of power for the high elves.
Walls made of wood surround this fortress, giving it a little bit of security.
The garrison is now surrounded by a thick stone layer, allowing it to survive sieges.
A place of science, magic and sorcery. This is also where the main spellcaster forces of the High elves get trained at.
A high elven tower that fires magic at enemies aproaching it.
The main place of worship to the Loa
A voodohut housing a skilled shadow shaman
A more militarized version of the Loa Altar, surrounded by elite troll warriors
The holy altar of Ula-tek, Goddess of Serpents
The feared trollraptors are bred in these stables.
A holy place to sacrifice prisoners and 'volunteers' alike to get the blessings of the Loa
A place for troll warriors to gather for future conquests
A building where fishers gather to go fish
A place for the local warriors to gather for future raiding, drinking and killing.
Archers of the local area come to hone their skills in this range.
Boats for trade commerce but also war are made in this shipyard.
Corrupted by dark forces this once holy and arcane place turned into a place of evil and death.
This is where the worgen for the inferious Orc Raiders are being kept.
Like a worg breeder, just everything is atleast three times bigger
The caverns of this nest are filled with eggs, hatchlings and guards.
Airships for warfare and commerce are being built in this wharft
Wood for the evergrowing goblin industrie gets shredder here and when there is need these shredders can also be used as strong soldiers.
Gnolls are gathering in this area to prepare for raids and plundering.
Towers made of stone created to protect the area from attackers.
Reinforced towers made of stone created to protect the area from attackers.
Dwarven soldiers learn how to use a gunpowder rifles in this building.
Weapons of war like the siege engine are being manufactured in these workshops.
The flight master allows quick transport from and to this location.
A guard post protecting the trade post
A trade dock allowing commerce in the area.
A holy place to the worshippers of the water deities
A necromancy school where members of the cult of the damned enhance their dark magic skills and create armies of the dead
The smartest minds of the realm will gather in these buildings to discover new things
A shield out of pure arcane powers protects this holding
A necromancy school where members of the cult of the damned enhance their dark magic skills and create armies of the dead

Mighty fortresses and architectural marvels that form the center of nerubian society

The wisdom of the nerubian is being written down in this library

The Vrykul warriors sleep and train in these halls
Longboats for raids and transportation are being built here
The Vrykul learned how to tame Proto Dragons and keep them in these Pens
